description.details: Automation test framework using POM and selenium. This is a maintainable framework to be used in web automation, you can easily configure the browser, data and all configs you need to be able to run all your test in a faster way.
description.stack: Created using: Selenium, Python, pytest, unitest, allure.

description.details: This automation framework was make from scratch with OxygenHQ and Appium using a Android device.
